title: T3 Old Mill Coupon ($35 shipped) & Tolstoi Cigarette Box Front ($45 shipped)
author: canjond

posts.post_title: T3 Old Mill Coupon ($35 shipped) & Tolstoi Cigarette Box Front ($45 shipped)
posts.post_content:
Neat Old Mill Cabinets coupon with back checklist.  Condition is VG, but very presentable overall.  $35.00 shipped.

Also have a trimmed box front from a Tolstoi cigarette pack.  Common practice of the time for pasting in a scrapbook.  Inexpensive alternative to a full pack!  Also, please note the box front displays much better than photographed - there are some funky shadows going on there!  $45.00 shipping.

Take both for $75.

Jon,
Neat Coupon but I am confused.  Isn't the reverse for a 1911 T3 Turkey Red? Looking at the names on the reverse, shouldn't they be only T210 Minor League players if the coupon is for H801-7?  What am I missing?

This is one of the T3 Turkey Red Coupons. 

Patrick
My bad, guys. You're 100% correct. My mistake.
